name: 2018/10/04 Lunch
description: Indulge in a healthy feast with our 2018/10/04 Lunch recipe! Packed with high-protein and low-carb ingredients, this dish is perfect for those following a health-conscious diet without compromising on flavor. Discover how belly, tilapia fillets, and eggplant can come together in a beautiful harmony, accentuated with a splash of lemon juice and hints of garlic and Parmesan. An excellent choice for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes without the guilt.

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the Garlic and dice the Red Onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Eggplant into rounds and chop the Tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Tilapia Fillets with Salt, Black Pepper, and half of the Lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a baking dish, layer the Eggplant rounds at the bottom, then place the seasoned Tilapia Fillets on top. Sprinkle with Garlic, Red Onion, and Tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle the Coconut Amino, Coconut Vinegar, and the rest of the Lemon juice over the tilapia and vegetables.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the foil, sprinkle the Parmesan over the top, and bake for an additional 5 minutes or until the cheese is slightly golden and bubbly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: While the fish is cooking, heat Extra Virgin Olive Oil in a pan over medium heat and sauté the Belly until crispy, set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the baked tilapia and eggplant hot, topped with crispy belly bits.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10
